name: planted.pulled
description: Bold BBQ marinade with smoky notes - perfect for tacos, burgers, or with fresh toppings.
longDescription: Get ready for a flavor explosion. Our planted.pulled BBQ comes drenched in a bold, smoky BBQ marinade that'll have you reaching for seconds. Made from sunflower protein and peas, it's perfect for building epic tacos, topping burgers, or serving with fresh lime and a spicy sauce.
ingredients: Water, sunflower protein (20%), pea protein, rapeseed oil, BBQ sauce (tomatoes, smoked paprika, molasses), natural flavoring, salt, vitamin B12
preparation: Heat in a pan for 3-4 minutes until warmed through. Perfect for tacos, burgers, sandwiches, or served over rice.

steps.title: Heat
steps.description: Pan on medium. Already sauced and ready.

steps.title: Serve
steps.description: Tacos, burgers, bowls—anywhere you want BBQ.
